A boolean setting.description: If you enable this feature, something will happen. Whenever users save new settings the addon will be restarted.

A number setting.description: Write a description here for a float.

A slider setting.description: Write a description here for a number. This one will be displayed as a slider, and is useful if you want to limit the range that users can enter. The only difference is that a maximum and minimum is provided

An enum setting.description: Write a description here. The only difference with a normal string is that enum is provided, which forces uses to select on of the options.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Starting this sentence with 'Advanced. ' will cause it be be shown under the advanced settings in the Candle store.
